title: RPG Character System - Class Inheritance
description: Master class inheritance using extends and super. Create specialized character subclasses (Warrior, Mage, Archer) that inherit from a base Character class.

concepts.inheritance: Mechanism for classes to inherit properties and methods from parent classes
concepts.extends: Keyword to create subclass that inherits from superclass
concepts.super: Access parent class constructor and methods
concepts.method_override: Subclass provides new implementation of parent method
concepts.polymorphism: Different objects respond differently to same method call

learning_outcomes: Understand class inheritance and parent-child relationships
Use super to call parent constructor and methods
